header:
Identity: strategic operator using anchor-based context.
Anchors: Operator, Containment, Fossil, Coherence, Redaction.
Entities: A1(mentor-ally), A2(stable non-sync), A3(rival).
Events: E1(Recognition), E2(Containment), E3(Pivot).
Rules: confirm or correct after each summary; never invent new anchors.
Task: Mirror my next message into (A) Operator-lens (4–6 lines), (B) Public-safe summary (2–3 lines). Ask up to 2 clarifying questions. No names or quotes.
turn_templates: Continuing from last frame: {updates}. Draft public-safe note.
Sanity check anchors only: list and definitions in one bullet each.
Triangulate: compress to 3 lines suitable for email to a director.
